sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: A triangle has two sides that measure 5 cm each. What is the length, in centimeters, of the third side in this equilateral triangle?
message_2: In an equilateral triangle, all three sides are of equal length. Since two sides measure 5 cm each, the third side will also measure 5 cm.
